snippet.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley – The Remembering Update Trailer
snippet.description:
In the biggest story update yet, uncover the mystery of the Forgetting in the Forgotten Lands Biome with help from a magical resident of the mysterious Pumpkin House. Journey through the Dreamscape—the dimension between Dreams and Reality—and experience epic story Quests alongside your Disney and Pixar friends in the Valley. 

Celebrate everything Pixar in a brand-new Star Path and earn unique prizes inspired by Pixar’s iconic and upcoming films!

Play now on PC, Mac and Consoles: https://disneydreamlightvalley.com/getnow 

To learn more about the update: https://disneydreamlightvalley.com/news/update-jun-7

Join the community on:
Instagram: http://instagram.com/disneydreamlightvalley 
Twitter: http://twitter.com/DisneyDLV 
Facebook: http://facebook.com/DisneyDreamlightValley 
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/disneydreamlightvalley 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@disneydreamlightvalley
